title: Order Room Service
description: An in-house guest calls to order a club sandwich and a soda from the room service menu.

tasks.description: Identify the guest by their room number and confirm their name.
Take the guest's order and confirm the items and price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly records the order for one club sandwich and one soda.

tasks.description: Place the order with the kitchen and post the charge to the guest's folio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the order and updates the guest's bill.
